title: What’s bi-directional charging? And why is it the next big thing for EVs?
content:
With the shift from gas-powered to electric cars comes the very real risk of EVs overpowering the energy grid, resulting in shortages at peak times. In response, a new opportunity for innovation and new business models has emerged: bi-directional charging. But what is it exactly, how does it all work, and how can I get involved? Let’s take a look.  What is bi-directional charging?  Bi-directional charging is the ability for your car battery to receive energy from the electricity grid and be also able to share the power it generates. description: EV expansion could overpower the energy grid. Bi-directional charging provides an opportunity to alleviate the pressure.
